医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究将真菌异质抗性与骨髓移植患者致命的血流感染联系起来埃默里大学研究员戴维·韦斯（David Weiss）花了数年时间研究一种被称为异质耐药性的令人困惑的现象，其中一小部分细菌仍然对抗生素具有耐药性，而其余细菌则屈服。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Study-links-fungal-heteroresistance-to-fatal-bloodstream-infections-in-bone-marrow-transplant-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Study-links-fungal-heteroresistance-to-fatal-bloodstream-infections-in-bone-marrow-transplant- Patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6775e48d-b9ff-42d7-b602-aedac0a49d81 Fri, 02 Aug 2024 17:18:00 -0400 Study links fungal heteroresistance to fatal bloodstream infections in bone marrow transplant patients
电动人造肌肉纤维：机器人和可穿戴设备的新兴电源在智能技术的动态格局中，电动人造肌肉纤维（EAMF）正在成为先进机器人和可穿戴设备的革命性电源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Electrically-powered-artificial-muscle-fibres-Emerging-power-source-for-robotics-and-wearable-devices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Electrically-powered-artificial-muscle-fibres-Emerging-power-source-for-robotics-and-wearable-devices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd1576ee-f465-4041-8b3d-6c1414075a50 Fri, 02 Aug 2024 17:10:00 -0400 Electrically powered artificial muscle fibers: Emerging power source for robotics and wearable devices
开创性研究使利什曼病疫苗的开发更接近科学家们开发出一种新的、安全且有效的方法，让志愿者感染引起利什曼病的寄生虫，并测量人体的免疫反应，使针对这种被忽视的热带疾病的疫苗又近了一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Pioneering-study-brings-leishmaniasis-vaccine-development-closer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Pioneering-study-brings-leishmaniasis-vaccine-development-closer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba0cb44e-f1dc-41a8-8ed5-fdff67aa4910 Fri, 02 Aug 2024 17:04:00 -0400 Pioneering study brings leishmaniasis vaccine development closer
研究为黑色素瘤进展的分子机制提供了新的见解中南大学湘雅医院皮肤科丛鹏等人进行了一项题为“NETO2通过激活Ca²⁺/CaMKII信号通路促进黑色素瘤进展”的研究，该研究探讨了Neuropilin和tolloid-like的作用2 (NETO2) 存在于黑色素瘤中，这是一种致命的皮肤癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Study-provides-novel-insights-into-the-molecular-mechanisms-of-melanoma-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Study-provides-novel-insights-into-the-molecular-mechanisms-of-melanoma-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f77a4e3a-5a5b-48e3-8cb9-525be15d1530 Fri, 02 Aug 2024 16:56:00 -0400 Study provides novel insights into the molecular mechanisms of melanoma progression
巴西记录全球首例奥罗普切热死亡病例世界上首例死亡病例是由奥罗普切热引起的，这种病毒是由蚊子传播的病毒引起的，这种病毒从巴西亚马逊雨林悄然传播，引起了科学家的警惕。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Worlds-first-deaths-from-Oropoouche-fever-recorded-in-Brazil.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Worlds-first-deaths-from-Oropoouche-fever-recorded-in-Brazil.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b14dcb6-8960-465c-8dc2-b738745507d1 Fri, 02 Aug 2024 16:49:00 -0400 World's first deaths from Oropouche fever recorded in Brazil
先进的成像技术揭示了单细胞每一种植物、动物和人都是微小、特化细胞的丰富缩影。这些细胞本身就是一个世界，每个细胞都有自己肉眼无法看到的独特部分和过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Advanced-imaging-techniques-shed-light-on-single-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Advanced-imaging-techniques-shed-light-on-single-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee96b640-789b-430d-adf7-ca78e219c8a0 Fri, 02 Aug 2024 16:42:00 -0400 Advanced imaging techniques shed light on single cells
机器学习如何加速结构生物学研究对于卢卡斯·法农（Lucas Farnung）来说，毫无疑问比单个受精卵如何发育成功能齐全的人类更令人着迷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/How-machine-learning-is-acceleating-research-in-structural-biology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/How-machine-learning-is-acceleating-research-in-structural-biology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4d97abc-04b7-41a9-a3bd-070f5e44eb4f Fri, 02 Aug 2024 16:35:00 -0400 How machine learning is accelerating research in structural biology
减少叶酸摄入量可以支持衰老动物模型更健康的新陈代谢在生命科学联盟发表的一项研究中，德克萨斯农工大学农业生命研究中心的科学家发现，减少叶酸摄入量可以支持衰老动物模型中更健康的新陈代谢，挑战了高叶酸摄入普遍有益于健康的传统观念。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Decreasing-folate-intake-can-support-healthier-metabolisms-in-aging-animal-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Decreasing-folate-intake-can-support-healthier-metabolisms-in-aging-animal-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e390e79-62ce-43ad-ad63-aa18f61ff33f Fri, 02 Aug 2024 15:31:12 -0400 Decreasing folate intake can support healthier metabolisms in aging animal models
肥大细胞被发现在过敏反应期间捕获和利用中性粒细胞肥大细胞以其在过敏反应中的作用而闻名，长期以来一直被认为是我们免疫系统的关键角色。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Mast-cells-found-to-capture-and-employ-neutropils-during-allergic-reactions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Mast-cells-found-to-capture-and-employ-neutropils-during-allergic-reactions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c147d06a-e073-4425-ac57-4ce39a091cc4 Fri, 02 Aug 2024 15:23:00 -0400 Mast cells found to capture and employ neutrophils during allergic reactions
研究显示，公共保险受益人不太可能接受糖尿病和肥胖症药物南加州大学的一项新研究表明，最有可能从治疗糖尿病和肥胖症的新药中受益的公共保险个人比拥有私人保险的人获得这些药物的可能性更小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Public-insurance-recipients-less-likely-to-receive-diabetes-and-obesity-drug-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Public-insurance-recipients-less-likely-to-receive-diabetes-and-obesity-drug-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bbc5db1-07cb-4a86-aaa7-901e9caa36c0 Fri, 02 Aug 2024 15:17:21 -0400 Public insurance recipients less likely to receive diabetes and obesity drug, study reveals
